document.full_text: the presbyterian church voted on tuesday to allow the ordination of gays, becoming the fourth protestant denomination in the united states to make the move that experts say reflects a larger cultural shift.
document.title: presbyterian church to ordain gays as ministers
lines_and_colors: the presbyterian church voted on tuesday to allow the ordination of gays, becoming the fourth protestant denomination in the united states to make the move that experts say reflects a larger cultural shift.
